00025 #include <set>
00026 
00027 #include "StringExt.h"

00029 namespace Hypertable {
00030 
00031   class FlyweightString {
00032   public:
00033     ~FlyweightString() {
00034       for (std::set<const char *, LtCstr>::iterator iter = m_strings.begin(); iter != m_strings.end(); iter++)
00035         delete [] *iter;
00036     }
00037     const char *get(const char *str) {
00038       std::set<const char *, LtCstr>::iterator iter = m_strings.find(str);
00039       if (iter != m_strings.end())
00040         return *iter;
00041       char *constant_str = new char [strlen(str) + 1];
00042       strcpy(constant_str, str);
00043       m_strings.insert(constant_str);
00044       return constant_str;
00045     }
00046 
00047   private:
00048     std::set<const char *, LtCstr>  m_strings;
00049   };
00050 
00051 }

00053 #endif // HYPERTABLE_FLYWEIGHTSTRING_H
